channel.title: Is it illeagal or ultra win?!?!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Is it illeagal or ultra win?!?!"

item.title: Re: Is it illeagal or ultra win?!?!
item.content:encoded: Rule of thumb: If someone wants to bingo you, they can. Regardless of what defense you use.

item.title: Re: Is it illeagal or ultra win?!?!
item.content:encoded: My Name Is stops you from being Notepage'd. You can still be regular bingo'd.

item.title: Is it illeagal or ultra win?!?!
item.content:encoded: Is it illegal to have the ascension theme active while having the My name is theme running? It would be a awesome combo, and im not sure if you could get booted for it? Ascension makes it so your village cant be attacked unless you are bingoed and My name is prevents you from being bingoed. So is it illegal or what?
